snippet: In the final event of the three-day meet, Kyle Clemons, David Verburg, Kind Butler III and Calvin Smith Jr. finished in 3 minutes 2.13 seconds, trimming 0.7 of a second from the indoor mark.
abstract: United States sets a world record in the men’s 4x400-meter relay at the world indoor championships in Sopot, Poland, finising in 3 minutes 2.13 seconds, trimming 0.7 of a second from the indoor mark.
lead_paragraph: In the final event of the three-day meet, Kyle Clemons, David Verburg, Kind Butler III and Calvin Smith Jr. finished in 3 minutes 2.13 seconds, trimming 0.7 of a second from the indoor mark.
